titleStmt.title: Cīrkāḻi, Campantar temple, time of Kulottuṅga Cōḻa, year 27

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

div.p: tribhuvaṉa-c-cakravart=tikaḷ maturaiyum iīḻamuṅ karuvūrum pāṇṭiyaṉ muṭi-t-talaiyum koṇṭ-aruḷiṉa śrī-kulōttuṅka-coḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu 2 10 7 vatu

rājādharāja-vaḷanāṭṭu-t tiru-k-kaḻumalattu Āḷuṭaiya-piḷḷaiyāṟku Iṉ-ṉn-nāṭṭu-t tiruvāliyāṉa Etirili-cōḻa-c-caturvveti-maṅkalattu-p piṭākai tiru-mullai-vāyil kaṭṭaḷaiyil palar pakkalum tirunāmattu-k kāṇi-y-āka vilai koṇṭa nilaṅkaḷukku pramāṇa-p paṭi

vr̥ścika-nāyaṟṟu pūrvva-pakṣattu prathamaiyum budhaṉ-kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa mulattu nāḷ mullai-vāyil-uṭaiyāṉ ciṅka-p-pirāṉ periyāṉ pakkal pautra-māṇikka-vatikku kiḻakku kaṇapura-tēva-vāykkkālukku vaṭakku muṉṟāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu 4 catirattu kiḻaikk' aṭaiya 1 kku kācu 1000 3 100ḷatu mullai-vāyil-uṭaiyāṉ cī-rāmatēvaṉ āvimuttiśvaram-uṭaiyāṉ pakkal iv-vatikku-k kiḻakku Ivvāykkkālukku vaṭakku 2 4 catirattu 1 Iṅkē Āka kku kācu 1000 3 100

taṉu-nāyaṟṟu Apara-pakṣattu pañcamiyum nāyaṟṟu-k-kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa makattu nāḷ maṉṉaṉ vēṇkāṭaṉ pakkal pautra-māṇikka-vatikku-k kiḻakku kaṇapura-tēva-vāykkkālukku vaṭakku 3 4 catirattu kku kācu 2 100 5 10ḷatu mullai-vāyal-uṭaiyāṉayyampukkāṉ r̥ṣapa-tēvaṉum ivaṉ tampi civatavaṉp peru-makaṉum pakkal kalikaṉṟi-vatikkuk kiḻakku Iv-vāykkkālukku vaṭakku 3 1 catirattu 6 vil mēṟk' aṭaiya 1kku kācu

ṟu purvva-pakṣattu daśamiyum tiṅkaḷ-kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa mr̥gaśīṣattu ṉāḷ kaṭalaṉpeṟṟāṉ-āṉa kāḻikkaṟ-pakanāṭāḻvāṉ pakkal pautra-māṇikka-vatikku-k kiḻakku kaṇapura-vāykkkālukku vaṭakku 2 4 catirattu teṟk' aṭaiya kāveri-y-āṟṟaṅkarai cūḻnta Iṭattu 2 100 kācu 2 100

miṉa-nāyaṟṟu pūrvapakṣattu aṣṭamiyum tiṅkaḷ-kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa mr̥gaśiṣattu maṉṉaṉ kaṭalāṉ-āṉa
poṉṉampala-kkūttanāṭāḻvāṉum ivan tampi marutaṉ-āṉa vētavaṉaṉāṭāḻvāṉum ivan tampi tiru-k-kaḻi-p-pālai Uṭaiyāṉum ivaṉ tampi Aḻakaṉum pakkal koṇṭa Ik-kaṇṇāṟṟu Ic-catirattu 1 kācu 8 100

r̥ṣapa-ṉāyaṟṟu Apara-pakṣattu caturddhiyum kāttikai nāḷ ceṭṭapoca-kōvintapaṭṭan pakkal kāṟkiyāṉ-vatikku kiḻakku mummuṭicōḻa-vāykkkālukku vaṭakku 2 2 catirattu kaḻiyuṅkaḻi-k-koppum 1 3 catirattu 2 3 2 catirattu 2 Ic-catirattu 3 4 2 catirattu 2 3 catirattu 1 4 catirattu 1 3 catirattu 1 6 2 catirattu 1 7 2 catirattu 1 8 2 catirattu 1 Āka 16 pautti-ramāṇikka-vatikku kiḻakku Iv-vāykkālukku vaṭakku 5 1 catirattu 3 2 catirattu 1/2 6 1 catirattu 1 2 catirattu 3 7 2 catirattu 4 1/2 Āka 12 Āka 2 10 8 āka kācu 7 100 .

2 10 8-vatu kaṟkaṭaka-nāyaṟṟu pūrvva-pakṣattu daśamiyum tiṅkaḷ-kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa viśākattu nāḷ kommai-pākkam-uṭaiyāṉ kākkuṉāyakkaṉ viti-viṭaṅkaṉ pakkal kāṟkiyāṉ-vatikku kiḻakku kaṇapura-tēvavāykkkālukku vaṭakku 7 4 catirattu kiḻaikk' aṭaiya 1 Iv-vatikku kiḻakku tillai-yāḷi-vāykkālukku vaṭakku 2 3 catirattu mēṟk' aṭaiya 1 niīkki Itaṉ kiḻakku 2 1/2 3 3 catirattu 6 Itil mēṟk' aṭaiya 2 kiḻakk' aṭaiya 2 Āka 8 kku

yaṟṟu Aparapakṣattu caturdaśiyum budhan kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa uttirāṭattu nāḷ kiḻakuṭaiyāṉ āṇṭa nampi uyyakkoṇ-ṭāṉ pakkal gautavaṉ tirukkaḻippālai uṭaiyāṉ kecavaṉ maturāntaka brahmamārāyarum gautavaṉ tirukkaḻippālai uṭaiyāṉ āṇṭārāṉavillavaṉ brahmamārāyarum gautavaṉ tirukkaḻippālai uṭaiyāṉ tirucciṟṟampalanampiyum uḷḷiṭṭār pakkal sākaṇaitevati aṉantapaṭṭaṉ peril ānyanāmakiraṇattu dāna-pramāṇam
eḻutivittuk koṇṭu eṉṉutāy nāṉ aṉupavittu varukiṟa māy nāṉ viṟṟu kuṭutta m ivvatikku kiḻakku ivvāykkkālukku vaṭakku 3 4 catirattu 6m 4 4 catirattu 6 5 3 catirattu meṟkaṭaya 4m 4 catirattu meṟkaṭaya 3 6 4 catirattu 6 7 4 catirattu meṟkaṭaiya 2 8 1 catirattu kiḻakkaṭaya 4 4 catirattu meṟkaṭaya 3 āka 3 10 4kku kācu 5 1000 .

2 10 9vatu siṃha nāyaṟṟu aparapakṣattu saptamiyum caṉik kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa rośaṇi nāḷ to śrīkr̥ṣṇapaṭṭaṉ pakkal mullaivāyluṭaiyāṉ cirāmatevaṉ utayañceytāṉāna tiruñāṉacampanta aḷakaikkoṉ-peril vilai koṇṭa ivvatikku kiḻakku ivvāykkkālukku vaṭakku 2 3 catirattu meṟkaṭaiya 3 itil meṟkaṭaiya 1kku kācu 2 100

minaṉāyaṟṟu aparapakṣattu tritiyaiyum viyāḻak kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa makattu nāḷ sākaṇai-tevati aṉantapaṭṭaṉ pakkal ivvatikku kiḻakku ivvāykkkālukku vaṭakku 3 3 catirattu meṟkaṭaiya āḷuṭaiyapiḷḷaiyār tirunantavaṉam 2 nikki itaṉ kiḻakku veḷḷāṉ paṟṟu 1 itil vaṭakkaṭaiya kollai 5kku kācu 100

taṉu nāyaṟṟu aparapakṣattu trayodaśiyum budhan kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa viśākattu nāḷ śrīkuntavacceri umiyūr vāmapaiṭṭaṉum ivaṉ tampi keśapaṭṭaṉum umiyūr tāmotāpaṭṭaṉ makaṉ āḷappiṟantāṉpaṭṭaṉum pakkal ivvatikku kiḻakku kaṇapuratēva-vāykkkālukku vaṭakku 7 4 catira meṟkaṭaiya 3 nikki itaṉkiḻakku eṅkaḷ pitākkaḷ apāvattu eṅkaḷutāy viṟṟu kuṭutta kku kācu 100 2 10

r̥ṣapa nāyaṟṟu pūrvapakṣattu pañcadaśiyum tiṅkaḷ kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa mulattu nāḷ ivvatikku kiḻakku tillaiyāḷivāykkkālukku vaṭakku 1 4 catirattu 6kku kācu 3 10 lu
ivaṉ makaṉ tiruveṇkāṭutevaṉum ivantampi ātaṉūruṭaiyāṉ tillaiventaṉ taṉi-nāyakaṇai mutukaṇṇākkakoṇṭu pautramāṇikkavatikku kiḻakku kaṇapurate-vavāykkkālukku vaṭakku 1 4 catirattu meṟkaṭaiya uṭaiyār tirumullaivāyilu-ṭaiyār ūṟkiḻ iṟaiyilum vilaikoṇṭu aṉupavittu varukiṟa 1kku kācu 1000 5 100

siṃha nāyaṟṟu aparapakṣattu ekādaśiyum tiṅkaḷ kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa puṇarpūcattu nāḷ peruṅkomaṅkalaṅkiḻāṉ nārāyaṇatevaṉāṉa kulottuṅ-kacoḻap pallavaraiyaṉ pakkal ivvatikku kiḻakku mummuṭicoḻavāykkālukku vaṭakku 8 2 catirattu kiḻaikkaṭaiya 2 vil teṟkaṭaiya 1m 8 4 catirattu 6vil teṟkaṭaiya 4m āka 5kku kācu 1000

kanṉi-nāyaṟṟu pūrvapakṣattu kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa aviṭṭattu nāḷ ilakkamuṭaiyāṉ am-palavaṉ pakkal tiruñāṉacampanta aḷakaiykoṉ peril koṇṭa kāṟkiyāṉvatikkuk kiḻakku tillaiyāḷivāykkkālukku vaṭakku 2 4 catirattu kiḻakkaṭaiya 6kku kācu 1000 7 100 .

3 10 1vatu kaṉṉi ṉāyaṟṟu pūrvapakṣattu ekādaśiyum śanik kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa aviṭṭattu ṉāḷ peruṅkomaṅkalaṅkiḻāṉ ṉārāyaṇateva-ṉāṉa kulottuṅkacoḻap pallavaraiyaṉ pakkal uṭaiyār tirumullaivāyiluṭaiyār koyilil ivaṉ vilai koṇṭa nilamāyk koṇṭa pautramāṇikkavatikku kiḻakku kaṇa-puratevavāykkālukku vaṭakku 4 4 catirattu 1000 .
tribhuvaṉacca-kravattikaḷ śrīrājarājadevaṟku yāṇṭu 3vatu kumpa ṉāyaṟṟu aparapakṣattu dvādaśiyum putaṉ-kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Uttirāṭattu nāḷ maturāntakaccerik kuṇṭūr vīṟṟiruntāṉpaṭṭa
Prosperity! Fortune!
First reported in (ARIE/1918-1919/B/1918/383).
First edited and translated in French in (CEC 34), based on autopsy, photos (U. Veluppillai, 2005), and ASI transcript (consulted in Mysore).
Re-edited here for DHARMA (ERC n° 809994) by Uthaya Veluppillai (2024).
